text: Ariel Winter routinely shuts down online bullies who shame her for wearing ` ` revealing'' outfits and accuse her of Photoshopping her pictures to appear slimmer. However, the ` ` Modern Family'' actress wasn't always so confident. Sarah Hyland, who plays Winter's older sister on the popular TV show, recently opened up to People about how she mentored Winter when they first met. ` ` I mean, she was 11 years old when I met her. I was 18,'' she told People. ` ` I tried to be a good role model for her, and a true older sister for her because she's such a sweet little girl.'' Hyland is now 26, and Winter is 19.
